name: Dimension Shard
author: 滞人
description:
(This mod is UNFINISHED)

There must be a war in a higher dimension. We found some kind of shards in a wreckage.
These shard look illusory and contain power beyond the dimension we are in.
The reasonable use of it seems to be able to manipulate time and space...
We named it "Dimension Shard."

(English translated by Google Translate)

Github: https://github.com/abomb4/dimension-shard
QQ: 779147200

name: Testing Utilities
author: MEEP of Faith
description:
Utilities for testing stuff.

Team Changer: Change teams easilty. (Disabled in campaign)
Seppuku Button: Kill yourself. Press and hold to commit crawler. A setting to make the death instant can be found in game settings.
Clone Button: Instantly clones your player unit. Press and hold to mass clone. (Disabled in campaign)
Heal Button: Sets your player unit's hp to its max. (Disabled in campaign)
Invincibility Button: Sets your player unit's hp to infinity. (Disabled in campaign)
Sandbox/Survival Button: Toggles infinite resources. (Disabled in campaign)
Fill/Dump Core: Fill or empty your core of all items. Hold to swap. (Disabled in campaign)

A setting for making the menu folded by default can be found in game settings.

Also increases zooming range.

name: -INDUSTRIAL-INNOVATION-
author: 幻森233_(虽然你看见我我不会承认)
description:
废话：
做了个中文语言文件，删了点东西，做了点平衡性，改了点名，优化了点代码

没了

版本：
重制版将不会支持6.0以下的版本，老版本请去玩非重制版；
mod版本号将随缘，你可能会看见奇怪的版本号；
mod偏向电脑端玩家，手机端出问题请自行解决；
**更 新 随 缘**

更新：
自己找，某些情况记得拆包

模组常驻下载地址和开源地址：
https://github.com/HuanSen233/-INDUSTRIAL-INNOVATION-mods-source-code-

没错源码和模组都放一个里面了(笑)

https://tieba.baidu.com/p/7335490223
